data.name: Rock scissors paper!
data.description:
Rock scissors paper is a kind of guessing game. It originated in China and then spread to Japan, North Korea and other places. With the continuous development of Asia Europe trade, it spread to Europe and gradually swept the world in modern times. The simple and clear rules make the rock scissors paper have no rule loopholes to drill. Single play competition for luck and multi round play competition for psychological game make the rock scissors paper an ancient game with two characteristics of "accident" and "technology" at the same time, which is deeply loved by people all over the world.

Rules of the game: stone beats scissors, paper beats stone, scissors beats paper.

Now, you need to write a program to judge the result of the Rock Scissors Paper game.



'Rock', 'Scissors', 'Paper' for inputs

'Draw', 'Player 1 won', 'Player 2 won' for outputs
